tool_description: Access a diverse array of workouts instantly with our API. Tailored to fitness enthusiasts, our API pulls from an extensive dataset to deliver personalized exercise routines, catering to specific muscles and equipment preferences. Simplify your fitness journey with targeted, data-driven workout selections
name: Work Out API
title: Work Out API

api_list.name: Get Work outs
api_list.description: This end point returns the work out json formate according to the inputs provided

optional_parameters.name: Intensity_Level
optional_parameters.description:
Available Intensity Levels
- Beginner
- Intermediate
- Expert

optional_parameters.name: Muscles
optional_parameters.description:
Available muscle groups
- Biceps
- Triceps
- Chest
- Back
- Legs
- Abs
- Stretching
- Warm Up
- Lats
- Hamstring
- Calves
- Quadriceps
- Trapezius
- Shoulders
- Glutes

optional_parameters.name: Equipment
optional_parameters.description:
Example of Equipments
- Barbell
- Dumbbells 
- EZ-bar
- kettlebell
- Bench
- Chest press machine
- and much more ...
*  It can also be empty

optional_parameters.name: WorkOut
optional_parameters.description: This Provides the name of the official workout
